registration.name: @:cloud-foundry
registration.title: Register a [[@:cf.registration.name]] Endpoint
registration.p1: [[@:cf.registration.name]] supports the full application lifecycle, from initial development, through testing to deployment.
registration.p2: Register an existing [[@:cf.registration.name]] endpoint to allow your development team to create and manage their applications.
registration.p3: When registering, choose a unique, recognizable name so that your developers can easily know which [[@:cf.registration.name]] endpoint they are working with.
registration.tagline: [[@:cf.registration.name]] supports the full application lifecycle, from initial development, through testing to deployment.
